title: LeBron James, MVP, Tom Brady, and Dak Prescott
itunes:title: LeBron James, MVP, Tom Brady, and Dak Prescott
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb talks about not crowning the Los Angeles Lakers just yet, the comparisons between LeBron James and Michael Jordan, who he thinks will win the MVP, the latest contract offer the Dallas Cowboys gave Dak Prescott, and more on where Tom Brady might land. Guests include Chris Broussard, Mark Schlereth, and Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
